column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Brittany - Thank you for the amazing review! We are so pleased you enjoyed our fare and had a great experience at our restaurant. Our Tonkotosu broths take a very long time to prepare
column2: and a lot of work goes into each bowl
column3: so it's always reassuring to hear supremely positive feedback such as yours. Thank you again
column4: and we hope to serve you again in the near future!
